question: Identify technology trends among companies in the healthcare industry based on their IT focus areas and contracts with vendors.
subtasks: [{"step":1,"task":"Analyze and extract IT focus areas specific to healthcare companies to identify technological interests and priorities.","table":["CompanyInfo","CompanyFocusAreaDetail"]},{"step":2,"task":"Gather contract records for healthcare-related technology services from the CompanyDealMaster table to see trends in vendor engagement and service types.","table":["CompanyDealMaster"]},{"step":3,"task":"Combine the results of the IT focus areas and vendor contracts to map out the prevalent technology trends in the healthcare sector.","table":["CompanyFocusAreaDetail","CompanyDealMaster"]}]}
